executable.title: EstimateCortexStreamlinesDensity
executable.description: Estimate the CSF density in each vertex of the input polydata

file.name: InputSurfaceFileName
file.description: a VTK file generraly the MID or 75P surface used to add EACSF sclars on it

file.name: InputOuterStreamlinesFileName
file.description: a vtk file which contains all the streamlines

file.name: InputSegmentationFileName
file.description: a nrrd file with the value of probability of CSF at each voxel (CSF probability map)

file.name: InputMaskFileName
file.description: a nrrd file used as a mask to limit the boundaries of the streamlines

file.name: OutputVoxelVistitingMap
file.description: a binary nrrd file indicating the voxels visited during the computation of EA-CSF density

file.name: OutputVoxelVistitingLength
file.description: a nrrd file indicating the lenghth of streamelines passing throught each voxels
